query.statement: SELECT A.CS301_TEM || '-' || A.CS301_RDT || '-' || A.CS301_SEQ ETN, A.CS301_SIR SIR, A.CS301_PST PST, CASE A.CS301_PST WHEN 'A1' THEN '작성' WHEN 'A2' THEN '반송' WHEN 'A3' THEN '전송' WHEN 'A6' THEN '승인' END PST_NM, A.CS301_MDT MDT, A.CS301_MID MID, ( SELECT USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND USERNUMB = A.CS301_MID ) MID_NM, A.CS301_CDT CDT, A.CS301_NAM NAM, A.CS301_SPT SPT, A.CS301_PJT PJT, A.CS301_BSU BSU, A.CS301_ADR ADR, A.CS301_SPC SPC, A.CS301_PRD PRD, A.CS301_CDY CDY, A.CS301_CPD CPD, A.CS301_CND CND, A.CS301_SRG SRG, A.CS301_GBU GBU, A.CS301_YGB YGB, A.CS301_BLD BLD, A.CS301_PDT PDT, A.CS301_CNT CNT, A.CS301_FLR FLR, A.CS301_SPD SPD, A.CS301_SYR SYR, A.CS301_HYN HYN, A.CS301_DYN DYN, A.CS301_CYN CYN, A.CS301_RM1||A.CS301_RM2 RMK, A.CS301_OPN OPN, A.CS301_DOC DOC, VALUE(B.APSTAT,'') APSTAT, VALUE(C.CS311_TEM,'') MASTAT, VALUE(C.CS311_TO2,0) MATOT, VALUE(C.CS311_AMG,'N') AMG, VALUE(D.CS654_RAT,0) RA1, VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) RA2, A.CS301_MMN MMN, A.CS301_DAT DAT, CASE WHEN A.CS301_GBU = 'A' THEN CASE WHEN A.CS301_CPD = 'A' THEN CASE WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_FMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 50000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 85.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 90.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 90.0 THEN '본부장 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_FMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 200000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 80.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 85.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 85.0 THEN '대표이사 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_FMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) > 200000000 THEN '대표이사 전결' END WHEN A.CS301_CPD = 'B' THEN CASE WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_PMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 50000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 85.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 90.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 90.0 THEN '본부장 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_PMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 200000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 80.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 85.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 85.0 THEN '대표이사 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_PMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) > 200000000 THEN '대표이사 전결' END END WHEN A.CS301_GBU = 'B' THEN CASE WHEN A.CS301_CPD = 'A' THEN CASE WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_FMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 50000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 90.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 95.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 95.0 THEN '본부장 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_FMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 200000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 85.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 90.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 90.0 THEN '대표이사 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_FMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) > 200000000 THEN '대표이사 전결' END WHEN A.CS301_CPD = 'B' THEN CASE WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_PMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 50000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 90.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 95.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 95.0 THEN '본부장 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_PMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) <= 200000000 THEN CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 85.0 THEN '팀장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) <= 90.0 THEN '본부장 전결' WHEN VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0) > 90.0 THEN '대표이사 전결' END WHEN (SUM(E.CS302_PMT) + SUM(E.CS302_HMT) + SUM(E.CS302_DMT)) * (INT(A.CS301_CDY) - INT(A.CS301_MMN)) > 200000000 THEN '대표이사 전결' END END END COF, A.CS301_STD AS STD, A.CS301_ETD AS ETD, A.CS301_ZMAN AS ZMAN, A.CS301_PNT AS PNT, A.CS301_SAJ AS SAJ, A.CS301_GIS AS GIS, A.CS301_TXT AS TXT, A.CS301_TOT AS TOT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST301 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBAP01 B ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.DOCNO = A.CS301_DOC AND B.DOCKIND = '21' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST311 C ON C.MANDT = A.MANDT AND C.CS311_TEM = A.CS301_TEM AND C.CS311_RDT = A.CS301_RDT AND C.CS311_SEQ = A.CS301_SEQ AND C.CS311_SIR = A.CS301_SIR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST654 D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.CS654_GNO = A.CS301_TEM || A.CS301_RDT || A.CS301_SEQ AND D.CS654_SIR = A.CS301_SIR, SAPHEE.ZCST302 E WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS301_DOC = #DOC# AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS301_TEM = E.CS302_TEM AND A.CS301_RDT = E.CS302_RDT AND A.CS301_SEQ = E.CS302_SEQ AND A.CS301_SIR = E.CS302_SIR AND A.CS301_GBN = '2' GROUP BY A.CS301_TEM, A.CS301_RDT, A.CS301_SEQ, A.CS301_SIR, A.CS301_PST, A.CS301_MDT, A.CS301_MID, A.CS301_CDT, A.CS301_NAM, A.CS301_SPT, A.CS301_PJT, A.CS301_BSU, A.CS301_ADR, A.CS301_SPC, A.CS301_PRD, A.CS301_CDY, A.CS301_CPD, A.CS301_CND, A.CS301_SRG, A.CS301_GBU, A.CS301_YGB, A.CS301_BLD, A.CS301_PDT, A.CS301_CNT, A.CS301_FLR, A.CS301_SPD, A.CS301_SYR, A.CS301_HYN, A.CS301_DYN, A.CS301_CYN, A.CS301_RM1, A.CS301_RM2, A.CS301_OPN, A.CS301_DOC, VALUE(B.APSTAT,''), VALUE(C.CS311_TEM,''), VALUE(C.CS311_TO2,0), VALUE(C.CS311_AMG,'N'), VALUE(D.CS654_RAT,0), VALUE(D.CS654_RA2,0), A.CS301_MMN, A.CS301_DAT, A.CS301_STD, A.CS301_ETD, A.CS301_ZMAN, A.CS301_PNT, A.CS301_SAJ, A.CS301_GIS, A.CS301_TXT, A.CS301_TOT WITH UR
